repo_notes.content: 使用中文生成文档主要内容

pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce the AgriculturePlatform repository, explaining its purpose as an agricultural e-commerce platform with product trading, financial services, and knowledge base features

pages.title: Architecture
pages.purpose: Explain the overall system architecture, including the separation between frontend (Nuxt.js) and backend (Go/Gin), and how they communicate

pages.title: Technology Stack
pages.purpose: Detail the technologies used: Nuxt.js 4.x, Vue 3, Element Plus, PrimeVue, Pinia, Go with Gin framework, GORM, and supporting libraries

pages.title: Frontend Architecture
pages.purpose: Describe the frontend structure including pages, components, composables, stores, layouts, and middleware patterns

pages.title: Backend Architecture
pages.purpose: Explain the backend layered architecture with controllers, services, and data access patterns using GORM

pages.title: Product Management System
pages.purpose: Overview of the most important feature: the complete product lifecycle from creation to purchase and order tracking

pages.title: Product Listing & Discovery
pages.purpose: Explain how users browse products with infinite scrolling, filtering, and search functionality

pages.title: Product Creation & Selling
pages.purpose: Detail the product creation flow including form validation, image uploads with Base64 encoding, and backend persistence

pages.title: Purchase Confirmation Flow
pages.purpose: Describe the purchase process through the ComfirmBuy dialog, including quantity validation and dual-order creation

pages.title: Order Management
pages.purpose: Explain how users view their buy orders, sell orders, and manage their product listings

pages.title: Financial Products & Loans
pages.purpose: Document the loan product discovery, filtering, and application tracking system

pages.title: Loan Product Discovery
pages.purpose: Detail the sophisticated filtering system for agricultural loans (amount, purpose, collateral, credit requirements)

pages.title: Loan Application Management
pages.purpose: Explain the loan application process and status tracking interface

pages.title: User Authentication & Management
pages.purpose: Document the complete user lifecycle including registration with email verification, login, and profile management

pages.title: Registration Flow
pages.purpose: Detail the multi-step registration process with email verification codes and validation

pages.title: Authentication & Sessions
pages.purpose: Explain login flow, JWT token generation, cookie-based session management, and route protection middleware

pages.title: Profile Management
pages.purpose: Document user profile editing including avatar uploads with cropping, and security settings

pages.title: Knowledge Base System
pages.purpose: Explain the agricultural knowledge article system with search and tag filtering

pages.title: State Management
pages.purpose: Document the Pinia store architecture and key stores: userStore, loanStore, comfirmBuyStore, knowledgeDataStore

pages.title: UI Components Library
pages.purpose: Document reusable components including ProductCard, KnowledgeCard, OrderCard, ComfirmBuy, ImageShow, and form components

pages.title: Layouts & Navigation
pages.purpose: Explain the layout system (homePageLayout, profilePageLayout) and navigation configuration

pages.title: Backend API Reference
pages.purpose: Comprehensive API documentation including all endpoints, request/response formats, and authentication requirements

pages.title: Product API Endpoints
pages.purpose: Document product-related endpoints: listing, creation, purchase, and order retrieval

pages.title: User API Endpoints
pages.purpose: Document user authentication, registration, and profile management endpoints

pages.title: Email Verification API
pages.purpose: Document the email verification endpoints for registration and security operations

pages.title: Data Models & Types
pages.purpose: Document key TypeScript interfaces and Go structs including Product, User, Order, LoanProduct, and their relationships

pages.title: Security Considerations
pages.purpose: Document authentication mechanisms, identify security gaps (commented JWT middleware, plaintext passwords), and provide recommendations

pages.title: Development Guide
pages.purpose: Provide setup instructions, development workflow, build configuration, and deployment considerations
